skills.name: Install Koa
skills.pattern: npm install koa

skills.name: Basic Server
Middleware
Context
Request
skills.pattern:
ctx.request.body // parsed body
ctx.request.query // query string
ctx.request.headers // headers
ctx.request.method // HTTP method

skills.name: Response
koa-router
Route Parameters
Router Prefix
skills.pattern:
const router = new Router({ prefix: '/api' });
router.get('/users', ...); // /api/users

skills.name: Nested Routes
koa-bodyparser
koa-body
skills.pattern:
const koaBody = require('koa-body');
app.use(koaBody({ multipart: true }));

skills.name: koa-static
skills.pattern:
const serve = require('koa-static');
app.use(serve('./public'));

skills.name: @koa/cors
skills.pattern:
const cors = require('@koa/cors');
app.use(cors());

skills.name: Error Handling
ctx.throw
Cookies
skills.pattern:
ctx.cookies.set('name', 'value', { httpOnly: true });
const name = ctx.cookies.get('name');

skills.name: koa-session
koa-views
koa-json
skills.pattern:
const json = require('koa-json');
app.use(json({ pretty: true }));

skills.name: koa-logger
skills.pattern:
const logger = require('koa-logger');
app.use(logger());

skills.name: koa-compress
skills.pattern:
const compress = require('koa-compress');
app.use(compress());

skills.name: koa-helmet
skills.pattern:
const helmet = require('koa-helmet');
app.use(helmet());

skills.name: koa-jwt
skills.pattern:
const jwt = require('koa-jwt');
app.use(jwt({ secret: 'key' }).unless({ path: [/^\/public/] }));

skills.name: File Upload
koa-ratelimit
skills.pattern:
const ratelimit = require('koa-ratelimit');
app.use(ratelimit({ driver: 'memory', db: new Map(), duration: 60000, max: 100 }));

skills.name: koa-compose
ctx.state
Redirect
skills.pattern:
ctx.redirect('/login');
ctx.redirect('back'); // redirect to referrer

skills.name: Cascade
skills.pattern: Koa middleware cascades in a stack-like manner: downstream then upstream (onion model)
